arrange-collection.header: What would you like to do?
arrange-collection.subheader: Tell us what would you like to do.
arrange-collection.cancel-request-message: You do not need to cancel your request for a nominated person to collect your BRP. If you are still unable to collect your BRP yourself, you can nominate a new person to collect it for you.

someone-else-group.title: Provide details of the person you want to nominate to collect your BRP.

change-person-group.title: Provide details of the new person you want to collect your BRP.

someone-else-reason.header: Why do you need someone else to collect your biometric card?

exit-not-eligible.subheader: You can only nominate someone else to collect your BRP if:

list.one: you have a serious illness or disability that prevents you from collecting it
list.two: you’re under 18 and can’t collect your BRP with your parent or guardian

contact-details.header: How should we contact you about your BRP?

address.title: Tell us your address so we can contact you by post.

check-details.header: Is the information you have given us correct?
check-details.subheader: If any information is incorrect, you can change it here.

org-help.title: Has someone helped you fill in this form?
org-help.explanation: This could be a friend, family member, immigartion lawyer or representative, a charity worker, an employer or a college or university official.

someone-else-check-details.header: Is the information you have given us correct?
someone-else-check-details.subheader: If any information is incorrect, you can change it here.

other-person.title: Details of person nominated to collect BRP

someone-else-confirmation.paragraph: We will review the information you have given. Once we've done this, we will send you a letter saying that your nominated person can collect your BRP from the Post Office. Do not send them to collect the BRP without the letter.

confirmation.header: Thank you, we have received your information.
confirmation.email: We have sent you an email containing the information you have provided to

para.one: We shall review the information you have provided, and let you know whether or not your your request has been approved.
para.two: We will respond as soon as we can. During busy times, this may take up to 5 working days.
para.three: We will then advise you what to do next.

para.one: You should hear from us in the next working day, We will tell you if you need to apply for a replacement BRP.
We will contact you in the next working day to tell you what to do.
para.two: As you are outside the UK, you may need to apply for a temporary visa to get back to the UK.
para.three: We will tell you if you need to apply for a temporary visa when we contact you.
